general_advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply organic and inorganic fertilizers during last puddling. Divide nursery area into smaller plots. Properly manage pests and diseases. Install heaters in poultry sheds during winter season.

advisory: Pre-sowing Nursery Management - Prepare wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Apply fertilizers and sowing techniques.
Seed treatment - Treat paddy seeds with appropriate fungicides before sowing.
